Near the site where the energon sphere had been, the grassy area 
around it had died. Dead weeds covered the ground. In the blast hole, 
Warhead still lied in stasis lock. However, his energy reserve worked 
hard to keep him from the lethal energon radiation. So hard, that it 
was almost depleted. A dangerous level had been reached, meaning he 
could die if nothing was done soon. In the predacon base, a warning 
signal lit up to tell the massive former-decepticon was in a deadly 
situation...
